msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: Bustan.
msItem.note: F1a: a) Ex Libris A Lockett (? struck through) C.J. Doyle b) Stamp, the name filled in in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by Colonel Doyle. Final folio, verso: a) In red, Ex LIbris C J Doyle b) Ex Libris A Lockett (?) Scribe's name is obscure. Headings omitted.

listBibl.bibl: Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 7 in list of Persian MSS.

layoutDesc.p: 11 lines on a page in double column

bindingDesc.p: English half-leather binding with marbled boards.

origin.p: After the first watch on Wednesday 20 Dhu 'l-Hijja A.H. 1217, regnal year 45 of Shah 'Alam..

acquisition.p: Presented by Lieutenant Colonel C.J. Doyle.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
